review_title: Great opportunity for single people wanting to work abroad
job_title: Youth Entrepreneurship Advisor in Cusco, Cusco
pros:
Paid for travel, accommodation and travel medicine. 
Family was able to travel and learn about another country.
Met some amazing people and made great experiences.
cons:
Sometimes felt some discrimination in my placement, but senior management didn't do anything when I brought it up. 
Larger advantages to singles as opposed to families financially (everyone gets exactly the same amount for accommodation/stipend allowance regardless of the size of the "family).
Expectations vs. reality of placement were not explained well (contract before getting to placement was different from the one we were presented in country).
